Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 87th/Cicero
ShortDescription: WB  87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Cicero, 88th Place, Cicero, then resume their normal route on 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound  #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Cicero, 88th Place, Cicero, then resume their normal route on 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Hoyne
ShortDescription: 20 Madison rtd WB via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Western & Madison; EB via Madison, Western Warren, Ashland & Madison due to police activity nr Madison/Hoyne

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Madison/Hoyne.

Westbound buses will operate via Madison, Ashland, Washington, Western, then resume their normal route on Madison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Madison, Western Warren, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Madison.

Allow extra travel time.
